conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric projection with clear wall thickness and volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation; wall geometry is clean and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity; room adjacencies and wall positions for major living areas are highly accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture corresponds well to the 2D plan types; kitchen island and dining sets are correctly placed.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean rendering; no text contamination or major artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Some internal door swings/openings are simplified or missing compared to the 2D architectural blueprint.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly all structural and programmatic relationships of the original floor plan.
